ygData.subject: RE: Re: Bards vs. casters, melee, etc.
ygData.msgSnippet: i dueled a level 50 ranger twice, once with weapons and once without.  he won both times pretty handily, though i even did slightly more damage with the lute
ygData.messageBody:
i dueled a level 50 ranger twice, once with weapons and once without. he
won both times pretty handily, though i even did slightly more damage with
the lute than with the weapons. there are two things i would like to try in
the future though. he was in full thorny vine, with 2 ykeshas and a haste
sash. i had yet to complete my imbrued armor set. now that i have
completed my armor set, as well as acquiring a haste sash, having our high
level songs not miss as much, and having a lute from the plane of hate, i
would love to try again. against melee classes we are often toast, but
against casters we have too many resources. my motto is if they can't cast,
they can't win =)

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


> I have heard
> of bards slaughtering rangers doing instrument attack
> with DDD/COD/HOR.
